title: [Large-scale] Web-Based Multimedia Grammar Learning: Interactive Exercises Utilizing Mathematical Terminology

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic mathematical terminology and sentence structures
context.additional_context: Integrating a web-based learning platform (WEPMAT) utilizing personal devices into classes to learn contextual usage of mathematical terms and grammatical structures through multimedia and interactive exercises

learning_goals: Learners can accurately interpret sentences containing mathematical terminology
Learners can apply grammatical structures with 80%+ accuracy through interactive practice exercises (fill-in-the-blanks, drag-and-drop, etc.)
Learners can explain the contextual meaning of mathematical terms using diverse multimedia resources (audio/visual materials)

resources: Mathematical Terminology Multimedia Content (Videos, Animations, etc.)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
